trans-unit.source: Identifies the configuration settings for Web proxy server.
This class cannot be inherited.

The following table shows the configuration attributes of the [\<proxy\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/proxy-element-network-settings.md) configuration element to which this class corresponds.
Element
Description
A URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.
Determines whether the Web proxy is bypassed for local resources.
Controls whether the Internet Explorer Web proxy settings are used.
Controls whether default credentials are used when accessing the configuration script.
Specifies the number of seconds that elapse before the configuration script is refreshed.
Specifies the number of seconds allowed for the configuration script to be downloaded.
Controls whether default credentials are used when accessing the Web proxy.
This class is used to specify and configure the Web proxy server to use for requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues"></xref> value that controls whether the Web proxy is automatically detected.

<xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues.True"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> is automatically detected; <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues.False"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> is not automatically detected; or <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.AutoDetectValues.Unspecified"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.
This configuration element controls whether requests for resources on the LAN are sent to the proxy server or sent directly to the host where the resource resides.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement.BypassOnLocalValues"></xref>.
Avalue that indicates whether local resources are retrieved by using a Web proxy server.
Gets or sets the URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing a URI.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> value that specifies the location of the automatic proxy detection script.
A <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> specifying the location of the automatic proxy detection script.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value that controls whether the Internet Explorer Web proxy settings are used.
`true` if the Internet Explorer LAN settings are used to detect and configure the default <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> used for requests; otherwise, `false`.
